plot: After a strange meeting on the school bus, Lisa and Michael decide to run away to a near-by forest where hidden secrets are revealed. A bitter-sweet coming of age story.
title: Lisa & Michael
plot_es: After a strange meeting on the school bus, Lisa and Michael decide to run away to a near-by forest where hidden secrets are revealed. A bitter-sweet coming of age story.
plot_en: After a strange meeting on the school bus, Lisa and Michael decide to run away to a near-by forest where hidden secrets are revealed. A bitter-sweet coming of age story.
